thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Paramount Extends Revolving Credit Facility From Nov 2018 To Jan 2022

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Paramount Extends Revolving Credit Facility From Nov 2018 To Jan 2022
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Paramount Group Inc:
* PARAMOUNT EXTENDS AND EXPANDS REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY * PARAMOUNT GROUP - OPERATING PARTNERSHIP, PARAMOUNT GROUP OPERATING PARTNERSHIP LP, EXTENDED ITS REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY FROM NOV 2018 TO JAN 2022
* PARAMOUNT GROUP INC - OPERATING PARTNERSHIP INCREASED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY CAPACITY TO $1.0 BILLION FROM $800.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
